import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ThemeProvider, Div, Row, Col, Text, Anchor, Image, Icon } from "atomize"; import SignUpModal from "./SignUp" import LoginModal from "./Login" function Nav() { const [userLoggedIn, setUserLoggedIn] = useState(false) const [SignUpModal, setSignUpModal] = useState(false) const [LoginModal, setLoginModal] = useState(false) const theme = { fontFamily: { primary: 'Teko, sans-serif', secondary: 'Oswald, sans-serif', code: 'Bitter, serif' } } return(
NETFLIX CLIQUES JOIN A CLIQUE ABOUT
SIGN IN SIGN UP
SIGN IN
) } export default Nav;
